mapper.select: select /* EBDSqCertiReqMapper.getPrePrcsList */ (select GROUP_CONCAT(cd_nm SEPARATOR ' > ') from co_code_mst where lft_val <= (SELECT lft_val FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = 'CLASS01002') AND rht_val >= (SELECT rht_val FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = 'CLASS01002') AND dpth < 4 AND dpth > 1) ctgry_cd_nm , prcs_mst.nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd = prcs_mst.stduy_mthd_cd and cd_id = 'STDUY_MTHD') stduy_mthd_cd_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd = prcs_mst.stduy_dd_cd and cd_id = 'STDUY_DD') stduy_dd_cd_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd = prcs_mst.stduy_time_cd and cd_id = 'STDUY_TIME') stduy_time_cd_nm , episd_mst.episd_year , episd_mst.episd_ord , (select code_mst.cd_nm from ed_edctn_episd_mst episd_mst join co_code_mst code_mst on code_mst.cd = episd_mst.cbsn_cd where edctn_seq = ptcpt_mst.edctn_seq and code_mst.cd_id = 'CBSN_CD') cbsn_cd_nm , episd_mst.edctn_strt_dtm , episd_mst.edctn_end_dtm , ptcpt_mst.cmptn_yn , ptcpt_mst.cmptn_dtm from sq_exam_appctn_ptcpt_mst appctn_ptcpt_mst join ep_edctn_ptcpt_mst ptcpt_mst on appctn_ptcpt_mst.ptcpt_seq = ptcpt_mst.ptcpt_seq join ed_edctn_episd_mst episd_mst on episd_mst.edctn_seq = ptcpt_mst.edctn_seq and episd_mst.episd_year = ptcpt_mst.episd_year and episd_mst.episd_ord = ptcpt_mst.episd_ord join ed_edctn_prcs_mst prcs_mst on prcs_mst.edctn_seq = episd_mst.edctn_seq where ptcpt_mst.mem_seq = #{memSeq} order by ptcpt_mst.reg_dtm desc
